Rroduct_Description_SC: 毕克化学研发了一种独特的助剂，BYKO2BLOCK-1200。此助剂基于薄片结构的改性粘土，特别针对食品包装薄膜。在加工（混料）过程中，剥离开的小薄片均匀分散在聚合物中，从而降低气体和水汽的透过率。毕克化学实验室的测试数据显示出添加少量的 BYKO2BLOCK-1200（3-5%）就能够在阻隔性能上获得显著地提高，例如对氧气、二氧化碳和水汽，而且其他性能，如机械性能和透明性保持。另外，BYKO2BLOCK-1200 还能够提高热变形温度。
Rroduct_Description_TC: 畢克化學研發了一種獨特的助劑，BYKO2BLOCK-1200。此助劑基於薄片結構的改性粘土，特別針對食品包裝薄膜。在加工（混料）過程中，剝離開的小薄片均勻分散在聚合物中，從而降低氣體和水汽的透過率。畢克化學實驗室的測試資料顯示出添加少量的 BYKO2BLOCK-1200（3-5%）就能夠在阻隔性能上獲得顯著地提高，例如對氧氣、二氧化碳和水汽，而且其他性能，如機械性能和透明性保持。另外，BYKO2BLOCK-1200 還能夠提高熱變形溫度。
Rroduct_Description_EN: BYK has developed a unique additive, BYKO2BLOCK-1200. It is based on a platelet-forming, modified clay additive that has been developed specially for use in foodstuff packaging films. During processing (compounding), the separated platelets are distributed equally in the polymer matrix, thereby bringing about a reduction in the permeability to gases and water vapor. Tests in the BYK laboratories have shown that even adding a small quantity of BYKO2BLOCK-1200 (3 – 5 %) can achieve a significant improvement in the impermeability towards gases such as oxygen, carbon dioxide and water vapor, without changing other properties such as the mechanics or transparency. Product_Name_EN: Silopren* LSR 27x9 series – Self-bonding liquid silicone rubber
Rroduct_Description_EN:
The self-bonding technology offered by Silopren* LSR 27x9 series can enable the efficient one-step over molding of silicone elastomers with thermoplastics and other selected substrates. Silopren* LSR 27x9 liquid silicone rubber series can adhere to many select substrates, such as PC (polycarbonate), PBT, polyester and etc. without the need for surface treatment and without adhering to metal molds. It also offers strong in-mold adhesion with PC without the need for primers. Additionally, it can allow short cycle times and one step curing to help improve productivity and enhance design freedom. These attributes make Silopren* LSR 27x9 series an excellent candidate for applications that require waterproofing, durability, soft touch feeling, aging stability, and other potential soft-hard design combinations. Additionally, this series can be used in low temperature molding, and its low viscosity can allow its use with a variety of molding processes. Silopren* liquid silicone rubber is also available in medical grades (Silopren* LSR 47x9 liquid silicone rubber).

*Silopren is a trademark of Momentive Performance Materials Inc.

Product_Name_EN: Silopren* LSR 4655 SL – Self-lubricating liquid silicone rubber
Rroduct_Description_EN:

Rroduct_Description_SC:

为了大幅提升 ZSK 高端系列挤出机的产量，科倍隆研发了特殊的渐开线螺杆元件和捏合块，其采用最新的享有专利的横截面设计。这种螺杆元件用于同时追求高分散性和填充量的高填充配方（主基料为 PP/PE 的 70-85%碳酸钙或钛白粉高填充、用于汽车应用的 20-50%滑石粉填充增强改性）时十分理想。除了更高的产量，这些渐开线螺杆元件确保了更高的填充度，更好的分散性以及分布性混合，更低的能耗（比能耗，千瓦时/公斤）以及更高的盈利。

在科倍隆斯图加特的实验室对不同配方进行的综合测试结果显示，采用新元件可以取得惊人的产量提升。例如，用 ZSK 58 Mc18双螺杆挤出机加工 PP 填充 70%碳酸钙时，新的螺杆元件使得产量从 550 kg/h 大幅提升到 900 kg/h。同样用 ZSK 92 Mc18加工 PE 填充 80%碳酸钙时也获得相同的效果，产量从 2,200 kg/大幅提升到 3,000 kg/h。

Rroduct_Description_EN:
For the first time, at this year's Chinaplas (May 16-19, 2017: China Import & Export Fair Complex, Pazhou, Guangzhou, PR China) Coperion GmbH, Stuttgart, Germany, introduces new involute screw elements for its high-end extruder series ZSK and its new pelletizer "SP treasure", an innovative, cost efficient strand pelletizer exclusively tailored to the Chinese market.

On its booth 5.1R01 in Hall 5.1 Coperion will present twin screw extruders ZSK 26 Mc18 and STS 65 Mc11. Also on display are a highly accurate Coperion K-Tron quick change twin screw feeder outfitted with ActiFlow™ bulk solids activator and the unique Electronic Pressure Compensation (EPC) system for loss-in-weight feeders, the K-ML-BSP-150-S Bulk Solids Pump (BSP) feeder for granular materials, Coperion's dual channel diverter valve WZKC for powders and granular products and a CRD rotary valve.

New ZSK extruder screw elements for higher throughputs

To significantly increase throughput rates of its first-class ZSK extruder series, Coperion has developed special involute screw and kneading elements with a new and patented cross section design. These screw elements are ideal for highly-filled recipes (70-85% CaCO3, TiO2, mainly based on PP/PE and 20-50% talc for automotive grades) for which the dispersion rating and the incorporation of the filler represents a limitation. Besides higher throughput rates, these involute screw elements ensure higher loading of filler, better dispersion and homogenization, lower energy consumption (SEI in kWh/kg) and a significant increase in profitability. Comprehensive tests at Coperion’s test lab in Stuttgart, Germany, showed a remarkable throughput increase depending on the recipe. For example, when processing PP and 70% CaCO3 on a twin screw extruder ZSK 58 Mc18 the new screw elements achieved a significant throughput increase from 550 kg/h to 900 kg/h. Similar results have been reached when processing PE with 80% CaCO3 on a ZSK 92 Mc18. In this case thoughput was increased from 2.200 kg/h to 3.000 kg/h.
